page.title: 15CLUBS Leisure (Children)
page.content: Many of the children's clubs are based at Blackboys Primary School.The clubs are taken after school by teachers. Some of the school-based clubs are:chess, school band, recorders and gymnastics. In the winter children have netball and football clubs.In the summer they play cricket, (the school have their own cricket nets), stoolball, rounders and swimming. Outside of the school there are local brownies and guides, cubs and scouts. These groups meet in the hut on Gun Lane. There is a Church Youth Club which runs every other Friday.This alternates with a disco - both are for 9-16 year olds.At the Youth Club they have rounders, snooker and table tennis.Other children may go fishing, hiking on the South Downs or they may just play with friends at the recreation ground.
